sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: My head is really bothering me.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: We have just the thing to help you out.

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Great, I could really use some relief.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: You should start feeling better soon.

sentences.speaker: David
sentences.sentence: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

sentences.speaker: Linda
sentences.sentence: You're welcome. Take care of yourself.

expressions.desc: 린다는 이 표현을 사용하여 데이비드에게 건강과 웰빙을 바랍니다.
expressions.example_en: You're working too hard. You need to take care of yourself.
expressions.example_ko: 너무 열심히 일하고 있어. 스스로를 챙겨야 해.
